Translations.Text: My ne poslaly vnyz na yoho lyudey, pislya yoho, soldativ z neba; my ne potrebuvaly poslaty yim vnyz
Vse tse vzyalo odyn udar, whereupon vony stilled
Yak zasmuchenyy yavlyaye soboyu umovu lyudey! Kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav yim, vony zavzhdy ridiculed yo
vony ne dyvylysya skilʹky heneratsiy my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak yim, ta yak vony nikoly ne povernuly yim
Kozhnyy odyn z nykh budutʹ sklykatysya pered tym, yak ny
odyn znak dlya nykh yavlyaye soboyu mertvu zemlyu: my vidnovlyuyemo tse ta produktsiyu z tse zerna dlya yikhnʹoho prodovolʹstva
My rostemo u tse park palʹm daty, ta vynohrad, ta my vyklykayemo pruzhyny khlynuty tam
Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty yikh z fruktamy, ta shchob dozvolyty yim vyroblyayutʹ z yikhnimy vlasnymy rukamy shchob ni vony potrebuyutʹ. Vony by buly vdyachni
Slava musytʹ khto utvoryv vsi riznovydy zavodiv z zemli, tak zhe, yak i sebe, ta inshi stvorennya shcho vony ne navitʹ znayutʹ
Inshyy znak dlya nykh yavlyaye soboyu nich: my usuyemo daylight zvidty, whereupon vony ye u temryavi
komplekty sontsya u spetsyfichne roztashuvannya, z·hidno z proektom Mohutnʹoho, Omniscient
misyatsʹ my zamyslyly z'yavytysya u étapiv, do tse staye lyublyatʹ staryy vyhnutyy sheath
sontse nikoly ne spiymaty z misyatsem - nich ta denʹ nikoly deviate - kozhnyy z nykh plavaye u yoho vlasniy orbiti
